Claim: "Alarmists claim that thriving forests are harmful."
Referring expressions: Alarmists, thriving forests, harmful.  Global warming
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsAlarmist(a) and IsHarmful(c))) & (forall e (forall f ( IsSeverelyHarmful(e) ->   IsHarmful(f))))) -> (exists d (IsSeverelyHarmful(d)))
